column2:
"<%me>, about that yellow
flower you brought back last time...
Yes, sadly it was another dead end."

"That's the most important thing, right?
But now she seems really interested in
what you said about the Floating Continent."

"There might be a clue there somewhere.
That's why I want to ask if you could bring
her back a rock from there."

"Please, for Matoi's sake. Whenever you
have time is fine."
